title: F18 Carrier Landing II Pro 1.1 – Flight simulator Game
content: F18 Carrier Landing II Pro, The most advanced aircraft carrier landing system ever created.   Landing on an aircraft carrier is one of the most difficult tasks a pilot has to execute. title: coucou 1.0.2 – Network Browser
content: With coucou you have every device on your network at your finger tips.   Need to share some files, or a screen? Want to manage a printer via its web interface? title: Earth 3D Amazing Atlas 1.3.1 – 3D globe wonders of the world
content: Earth 3D Amazing Atlas features wonders of the world, political and geographic maps, and weather. Discover a lot of fascinating facts and useful information about our planet! title: Waffle 1.1 – Easily create mosaic photos.
content: Waffle is a photo mosaic application for the rest of us. Having a simplistic interface, this application requires only a few click to make a photomosaic! With a clean Mac interface, good look, reasonable performance and great result, this app is suitable for most everyone: from a creative kid to a pro designer who needs […]

title: TCel 1.5.1 – Make your webpages pixel-perfect
content: TCel empowers front-end Web developers to get their webpages pixel perfect. title: SimpleScrobbler 2.0.1 – Last.fm scrobbler without all the bells and whistles
content: SimpleScrobbler is a Last.fm scrobbler without all the bells and whistles. A Mac App that lives in your status bar and leaves a smaller footprint on your computer.   SimpleScrobbler gives you: Simplicity. SimpleScrobbler has one purpose: Scrobble your tracks. Silence. title: Compartments 2.1.2 – Home inventory application

title: Translucent 1.7.1 – Displays system monitoring info
content: Translucent provides detailed real-time information about what is going on inside your Mac. title: Temperature Gauge Pro 2.0.2 – Control fan speeds, monitor temperatures, and find faulty sensors
content: Temperature Gauge Pro is a must-have utility for every Mac user with four top features: Check up on your Mac by viewing the current and maximum recorded temperatures for every sensor. title: pwSafe 3.0 – Password Safe compatible Password Manager
content: Simple & secure password management across devices and computers. pwSafe uses iCloud to keep your password databases backed-up and synced between Macs and iOS devices.
